# 과제 1

Ozone ~ wind simple linear regression

```{r}
x1 <- airquality$Wind
y1 <- airquality$Ozone
linreg <- lm(formula = y1 ~ x1)
```

---

###plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(x = x1, y = y1)
abline(linreg, col="red")
```
